author: chris-dollin
msg: A change to GraphBase and children; instead of overriding find, children
This allows the canonical implementations in GraphBase to be where the
reification quadlets come from, rather than (as at the moment, cough)
Standard graphs *storing all the quadlets again*.

author: ian_dickinson
msg: Added constructor that allows one one-to-many map to be initialised

author: ian_dickinson
msg: Undoing the addition of EmptyIterator, since NullIterator, despite having
a non-obvious name, has the advantage of seniority

author: chris-dollin
msg: Added NiceIterator::ensureHasNext() [provoked by BDB work] and used in
several places. Made GraphBase::contains(Node,Node,Node) final and
had it invoke contains(Triple). Removed redundant contains code from
CompositionBase and BaseInfGraph and GraphRDB. Intending to simplify
uses of GraphBase and preparing for final reification cleanup.

author: ian_dickinson
msg: Added EmptyIterator that always returns false to hasNext(); replaced
constructs that create empty data structures to give an empty iterator
